name: SanGen Systems
tag_list: mobile, health, mhealth, m-health, apps, mobile-apps, mobile-health, mobile-education, m-education
overview:
SanGen Systems creates, designs and delivers web and mobile software solutions to engage, inspire and enhance mobile health, mobile education and mobile lifestyles.

With the rapid advancement of smartphones, tablets and data networks, every business needs to have an effective mobile strategy in order to stay ahead of the curve. We work closely with our clients to understand their goals, aims and opportunities, and use data and insight to make informed recommendations on the best mobile and digital strategy and solutions. We transform the way our clients communicate to their audience by delivering the tools and platforms that will enhance, extend and engage their messages and information with their target audience.

SanGen is committed to simplifying the complexities of using mobile solutions to engage your audience. No matter if your audience consists of customers, clients, patients, suppliers, members or colleagues; our solutions will help you engage with them on one of their most-used possessions: their smartphones. Tablet devices also provide a powerful and unique platform to serve and communicate with your audience.

We understand that each of our clients have unique requirements, and thatâ€™s why we work with you to customize our solutions to meet your specific objectives. SanGen provides software solutions to help our customers become more efficient, more productive and more profitable.

SanGen’s specialist disciplines include:

  • Design and development of mobile internet sites and applications
  • Mobile health (‘mhealth’) integration and applications
  • Mobile and digital strategy consulting
  • Mobile membership and engagement platforms
  • Mobile and cloud-based information management
  • Integration with third-party and enterprise software platforms
  • Mobile advertising and marketing
